text: Chartchai Chionoi (; ) a.k.a. Chartchai Laemfapha (; ) or birth name Naris Chionoi (; ; October 10, 1942 â€“ January 21, 2018) was a former professional Thai boxer, WBC World champion & WBA World champion in the flyweight division. Chionoi took the WBC World Flyweight Title two successive times and the WBA Title one successive times before finally relinquishing it. He was born near Hua Lamphong Station, Pathum Wan District, Bangkok. Chionoi died on January 21, 2018 of pneumonia complicated from Parkinson's disease in Bangkok at the age of 75. ==References== ==Other websites== * Chartchai Chionoi - CBZ Profile Category:1942 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Thai sportspeople Category:Boxers Category:People from Bangkok
title: Chartchai Chionoi
